London is very much alive, the Queen celebrates her Diamond Jubilee and the London Olympics is about to rear its extravagant head.
In the midst of it all, Ellie is a young girl eager to jump into the newspaper business. Just as she begins her internship with the broadsheet THE EDGE; however, her father goes missing. She is thrown headfirst into a web of lies, and brought into conflict with ruthless business interests and corrupt politicians. With the aid of her younger sister, Charlotte, Ellie sets out to search for her absent father. What she finds however, will change her world forever...

An exciting crime drama set in the present day where nothing is as it seems, corruption and deceit are the norm, and people are willing to do anything to get their way, Web of Lies is a story of love, danger and spiders.
Head: Yes

title: Playing with controversy
blurb:
Splash! A tear fell to the floor with a clap of thunder from the distance. Shaun must overcome his fears in a game to understand his depressing real life with the help of his friend Candy. Trying to escape this magical world, he finds what he had been searching for and his life changes dramatically. You would never think that having a step father would ever turn this bad! However, with the help of his only friend and a strange creature he meets along the way, will Shaun overcome his fears?

“ Playing with Controversy ” is a dark addictive adventure novel following the desperately miserable existence of an anti-social teenager. Became engrossed into this magical, fantasy, spine chilling book which will keep you on the edge of your seat. Nothing will make you put it down.

Do you think Shaun will ever get out?

title: Roadkill casserole
blurb:

dinner. Plus a couple of twists along the way but that’s not the worst

murder mystery which results in Sophie calling in help from her
brother Rat. Will he find out who done it and why?

title: The Delivery
blurb:
High above the streets of London, Jacob, Riq, Mike and Joseph have learnt how to fly. Free running is their sport and their passion, and it takes them to places that few people ever get to see.
So when they are approached by a mysterious business man who tells them that they can get paid for doing what they love, it seems too good to be true.
Before they know it, they are spiralling into an underworld of deception and blackmail, learning that, in the life they have chosen, it is difficult to know who to trust.
Who will come out unscathed? Or will they all be changed forever?
